item.title: Mech Arena Promo Codes (October 2024)
item.description:
Mech Arena is a dynamic multiplayer shooter for mobile devices in which you can experience an unforgettable experience of controlling a mech. Having chosen a large robot and equipped it with parts and weapons, you can go to one of the game modes to test your skills and earn currency to buy something more powerful. Victories bring tons of valuable currency rewards and even cases, but if you want to get something for free, use Mech Arena promo codes.

Using codes, you can get in-game currency, components for your mechs, or other stuff. However, codes have a limited expiration date, so you should use them as soon as possible.

Updated October 9, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: This guide is designed to be your go-to for all code updates. We regularly review and refresh the content to keep it as current as possible.

All Mech Arena Codes

Working Mech Arena Codes

  • mech3years - Enter this code to get the Golden Age Epic Skin.
  • FIREPOWER - Enter this code to get the rare weapon Rocket Mortar 10.

Expired Mech Arena Codes

  • CHAMPION - Enter this code to get the Skin.

While you can get all the best parts and weapons for your mechs by just playing the game, sometimes there's nothing better than a little freebie. Of course, you will not get super powerful items using the codes, but you can get a decent weapon or some money to buy new items quite early on. After all, replenishing your hangar with new components is one of every player's main goals, allowing you to diversify the gameplay significantly. However, reward codes have a limited expiration date, so hurry up and get all of them.

How to Redeem Mech Arena Codes

Unlike in many mobile games, the ability to redeem codes in Mech Arena is available from the first seconds of the gameplay. To do this, you need to copy the active code and follow these steps:

  • Launch Mech Arena .
  • Once in the main menu, click on the envelope icon at the top of the screen to go to the Mail tab.
  • Go to the Promo Code tab.
  • Enter the code in the Enter Promo Code text box.
  • Click Confirm, and you will receive your rewards.

How to Get More Mech Arena Codes

As with most other free mobile games, you can find more Mech Arena promo codes during events and holidays or as a regular promotional reward created to increase popularity. You can find a list of all new codes by checking our guide periodically. However, if you want to keep abreast of all the in-game news, you can follow the official developer pages:

  • Discord
  • Twitter
  • Facebook
  • YouTube

Mech Arena is available on mobile devices.

item.title: Roblox: TV Defense Codes (October 2024)
item.description:
TV Defense is a Roblox tower defense game with characters from the Skibidi toilet meme. If you like this meme, then you should definitely play the game because there are dozens of characters with different abilities, many opponents, and interesting matches where you and other players try to hold the defense, wave after wave. In addition to the interesting gameplay, you can also get plenty of bonuses for free if you redeem a few TV Defense codes.

Updated October 9, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: Developers release codes frequently, and we're here to make sure you don't miss out. Bookmark this guide and check back for new rewards.

All TV Defense Codes

Working TV Defense Codes

  • SCPEVENT - Enter this code to get 500 SCP Coins.
  • MEOWDEV100K - Enter this code to get a reward.
  • MEOWDEV - Enter this code to get 1900 Money.
  • 10MVISITS - Enter this code to get 10 Red Crystal.

Expired TV Defense Codes

  • MEME2024
  • FREEGEMS
  • BACKROOM
  • HAPPYSONGKRAN
  • SONGKRANDAY
  • EASTERDAY

In TV Defense , to fight the evil toilets, you can upgrade perks, summon tvmans, and master them. For all of this, you need different currencies and resources, and luckily, you can get some of them all for free. Just copy the TV Defense codes from the list and redeem them in the game.

How to Redeem Codes in TV Defense

Usually, in different Roblox games, it is easy to redeem codes because it is an important option that attracts and retains players. That's why very few games make redeeming codes difficult, and fortunately, TV Defense is not one of them. As soon as you get into the game, you will immediately notice several large buttons in the interface, one of which is the Codes button. However, some players have little experience with Roblox games and may need some extra help. This is not an issue, because we have created a guide explaining how to redeem codes in TV Defense .

  • Open Roblox and launch TV Defense .
  • Pay attention to the bottom of the screen. There, under the number of gems, you will find the Codes button.
  • In Codes, paste the code from the list of active codes into the white field and click Redeem.

You should know that some codes may expire over time. This means you will not be able to receive rewards for them, so use them as soon as possible.

How to Get More TV Defense Codes

To get more Roblox codes, you'll need to search the internet, so just bookmark this guide in your browser. We update it regularly, so you won't miss a single code and will get all the rewards. You also can visit the social media pages of the TV Defense developers, where you will also find information about new codes:

  • TV Defense Discord channel
  • TV Defense YouTube channel

item.title: Roblox: Fat Race Codes (October 2024)
item.description:
Fat Race is a simple but addictive clicker with a fairly common concept but complex mechanics that are not often found in similar Roblox games. Here, you will need to click to eat and thus earn power to have a chance to win the race.

By redeeming Fat Race codes, you will receive generous rewards from the developers that will help you progress in the game much faster. Each code offers useful rewards, such as currency, resources, or booster potions that will increase your efficiency, so don't neglect it.

Updated October 9, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: We have carefully updated this guide to ensure you have access to all the latest working codes. Check it out and get your rewards before they expire.

All Fat Race Codes

Working Fat Race Codes

  • 100LIKES - Redeem this code to get 10 Gems and Short Swords.
  • 1KLIKES - Redeem this code to get 40 Gems and Clover.
  • WELCOME - Redeem this code to get 50 Gems and Short Swords.

Expired Fat Race Codes

  • 100 LIKES - Redeem this code to get 10 Gems and Short Swords

Redeeming Fat Race codes will be equally useful for both beginners and experienced players. Each code offers decent rewards that will definitely come in handy on the way to the top of the leaderboard.

How to Redeem Codes for Fat Race

Fat Race 's redemption system is not complicated and similar ones can often be found in other Roblox experiences. But if you have any difficulties, or perhaps you're doing it for the first time, here's a detailed guide:

  • Launch Fat Race .
  • Pay attention to the lower right corner of the screen. There will be a button with a gear icon. Click on it.
  • This will open the settings menu. There will be several options and a blue Codes button below them. Click on it.
  • This will open the redemption menu. There will be an input field and a green Claim button below it. Now, enter manually, or better yet, copy and paste one of the above-mentioned active codes into the input field.
  • Lastly, click on the green Claim button to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, a notification will appear on the screen with a list of rewards received.

How to Get More Fat Race Codes

Finding more Roblox codes is not difficult, but time-consuming, as it requires careful research on the game's official social media. There, the developers share codes from time to time, so by regularly visiting these pages, you can be one of the first to receive rewards:

  • Official Fat Race Roblox group.
  • Official Fat Race game page.
  • Official Fat Race Discord server.

item.title: Fortnite Confirms Early Release Date for Fortnitemares 2024 Update
item.description:
Key Takeaways

  • Epic Games confirms Fortnitemares 2024 will start on October 11.
  • Previous leaks suggested the event would start on October 15.
  • Fortnitemares 2024 will include collaborations with Saw, The Texas Chainsaw Massacre, and more.

Epic Games has announced that the next Fortnite Halloween event for 2024, known as Fortnitemares, will begin on Friday, October 11. Leakers had previously stated that the new Fortnitemares update would be released on October 15, as Tuesday is the usual day for new Fortnite patches, but Epic has now confirmed that the event will be kicking off four days earlier than fans originally anticipated.

Each year, fans patiently await the return of Fortnite 's massively popular Halloween event and 2024 is no different. After kicking off the first Fortnitemares event in 2017, the yearly Halloween updates have been a big hit for the popular Battle Royale game, and feature plenty of spooky new Fortnite skins, items, quests, and more. While the length of the event has yet to be confirmed by Epic, fans can likely expect between two to three weeks of Halloween-themed content to get stuck into, including collaborations with Saw, The Texas Chainsaw Massacre, and much more.

Previous leaks suggested Fortnitemares 2024 would begin on October 15, but Epic Games has now announced via its official social media accounts that the new update will drop on Friday, October 11. A short cinematic trailer was released alongside the date, showcasing some of the new cosmetics coming to Fortnite with the update. Unfortunately, details on the contents of the event are still scarce, but fans can likely expect some new and unvaulted weapons from previous Fortnitemares events, and possibly even some special quests for players to complete.

Epic Games Confirms Fortnitemares 2024 Release Date

  • Friday, October 11, 2024

Currently, Epic has confirmed that Fortnitemares 2024 will bring new Fortnite skins such as Billy the Puppet, which is available now via the in-game item store, Mephisto, Leatherface, and Lexa Hexbringer, an original Fortnite skin. For fans looking to get their hands on the new Billy the Puppet skin, they'll need to fork out 2,500 V-Bucks for the entire bundle or purchase the standalone skin for 1,500 V-Bucks.

There has also been speculation that Fortnite will introduce some Disney villain skins with Fortnitemares 2024 after it revealed more details about the massive collaboration earlier this week. The two companies are currently working together to create a massive Fortnite experience like no other, but it was recently confirmed that various Disney villains, such as Captain Hook, Maleficent, and Cruella de Vil would be the next Disney skins to come to Fortnite , leading to speculation that they will be released during the Fortnitemares 2024 event.

item.title: Dr. Light's Gift to Mega Man X
item.description: It's better to give than to receive a terrible present. Whether giving or receiving, however, always remember to smile.
